pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with United Nations Secretary General-elect António Guterres | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with United Nations Secretary General-elect António Guterres.

Prime Minister Trudeau confirmed Canada’s commitment to playing a leadership role in the United Nations and looked forward to working closely with Mr. Guterres as he embarks upon his new mandate starting January 1, 2017.

The Prime Minister and the Secretary General-elect discussed a range of areas for further cooperation, in particular women and youth, and looked forward to working together to finding solutions to the most pressing global challenges.
